articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 10215 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 When he appeared in the auditorium, the audience enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest regard to him.
					
					 The members of the art squad put on the stage quintet poem recital "A Song in Praise of General Kim Il Sung", serial songs "Song of Mangyongdae", drama based on real story "Eternal Heart of Defender", female solo "We Long for You, General", mixed quartet "Love for the Motherland and Hate for the Enemy," bass guitar and song "Chollima Gallops Forward", poem and chorus "Green Pine on Nam Hill" and other numbers of various genres.
					
					 Through the performance the artistes vividly represented the shining course of struggle the KPA has covered, winning victory and glory only under the care of Kim Jong Il, the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, and the unshakable faith and will of the servicepersons of the KPA to reliably guarantee the building of a thriving nation and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms while defending the precious gains of the Party and the revolution at the risk of their lives.
					
					 They also powerfully demonstrated the might of the army artistes who are successfully discharging their sacred mission as the buglers of the Songun era, instilling ardent love for the Party and the leader, the country and the people into the servicepersons.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the art squad staged a unique and militant performance with successful works of great cognitional and educational value as it fully reflects the inexhaustible mental power of the servicepersons. He highly appreciated their successful performance and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA General U Tong Chuk, member of the NDC of the DPRK, KPA Generals Kim Won Hong and Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the army, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and other leading officials of the Party Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Participants in Art Festival
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Participants in Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a combined performance given by participants  in the field of mass art of the Second April Spring People's Art Festival. 
					  Members of art groups of various factories, enterprises and cooperative farms and members of art squads and itinerant art agitation squads put on the stage chorus "Song of Loyalty", agitation and song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", dialogic poem "Vinalon of the General", small chorus "Eternal Spring of the Sun" and poem and chorus "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science" and other colorful numbers of diverse genres.
					
					  The performers enthusiastically sang of the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung to shine forever and the happiness of the Korean people who fully enjoy an independent and creative life in the socialist country of Juche and successfully represented the revolutionary spirit and strong will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to dash ahead like the wind toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					  They, at the same time, powerfully demonstrated the might of the rapidly developing mass culture and arts in the era of Songun through the performance pervaded with revolutionary enthusiasm and rich emotion. 
					
					 After the performance was over, Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the performers on their successful performance. 
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction with the fact that the performers gave a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry as it was distinct in the policy stand and fully reflected the requirements of the times and the desire of the people, he highly appreciated the success made in the presentation and extended thanks to them.
					
					 All the groups of participants staged peculiar numbers truthfully representing their efforts and life, he said, adding that this clearly proves the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy on popularizing arts.
					
					 Noting that the festival proved to be a significant festival at which the ardent desire of the service persons and people to hold the President in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages turned into all people's songs in praise of him and marked a meaningful occasion in instilling inexhaustible strength and courage into all of them, he extended a warm salute to all the participants in the festival who have made a great contribution to adorning the April spring holiday in a peculiar manner with songs of the leader, revolutionary songs. 
					
					 Under the socialist system in the DPRK where the working people have become creators and enjoyers of true arts genuine arts can be found in the struggle and life of the popular masses and revolutionary arts have become a powerful means for powerfully encouraging them in their revolutionary struggle by emotionally impressing them and enlisting their mental power, he noted, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing mass culture and arts. 
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the KPA and armed forces organs, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and  Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Give Congratulatory Performances
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Give Congratulatory Performances
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Participants in the Second April Spring People's Art Festival conducted agitation for increased production and gave congratulatory performances at factories in Pyongyang on Saturday.
					 The itinerant art squads of the Taean Heavy Machine Complex, Yomju and Hwangju counties, the Kim Chaek Taehung Fishery Enterprise and the Pongchon Coal Mine conducted agitation for increased production at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory, the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory and the Pyongyang Flour Processing Factory.
					
					 They put on the stage mixed singing "My Country Is the Eternal Country of the Leader", male chorus "General on a Galloping White Horse", poem and chorus "A Thriving Nation Is Seen", instrumental music and song "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" and other colorful numbers, encouraging the workers who are glorifying the undying leadership feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu by bringing about an unprecedented boost in their production.
					
					 The artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe, the State Folk Art Troupe, the Cinematic and Radio Musical Company and the art troupes of South Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Jagang, South Hwanghae, and North and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City gave congratulatory performances at the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory and the Songyo Knitting Mill for the innovators who greeted the Day of the Sun with great labor achievements.
					
					 Acrobats of the Pyongyang Circus staged numbers requiring high skill and humorous ones at the Ryuwon Footwear Factory, instilling the revolutionary emotion and optimism into its workers bringing about innovations in production.

articles.title: DPRK Prove Successful at Asian Junior Weightlifting
articles.content:
DPRK Prove Successful at Asian Junior Weightlifting
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters proved successful at the 12th Asian Junior Weightlifting Championships.
					 The DPRK players carried off 8 gold medals and 4 silver medals at the championships which brought together more than 300 weightlifters from 31 countries and regions including China and Kazakhstan.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang and Kim Su Jong came first in snatch and jerk in women's 69 and over and 69 kg categories, thus placing first in total and bagging three gold medals each.
					
					Kim Kuk Hyang, in particular, set two new Asian Junior records.
					
					 Kim Song Chol came second in snatch and first in jerk in men's 62 kg category, thus placing first in total and gaining two gold medals and one silver medal. And Yun Han Min placed second in snatch and jerk in men's 50 kg category, thereby coming second in total and carrying off three silver medals.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Drop Their Policy of Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Drop Their Policy of Confrontation
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and opposition parties of south Korea at a press conference at the "National Assembly" on April 15 condemned the puppet authorities for blocking the tour of Mt. Kumgang and escalating the confrontation with the north. 
					 Speakers at the press conference held that the tour of Mt. Kumgang was driven into a catastrophe mainly because the authorities have insisted on what they called "three conditions" for the resumption of the tour.
					
					 Such situation was created despite the necessary steps taken by the north side on various occasions, an indication that the authorities are interested only in blocking the tour, they charged.
					
					 The authorities had better take positive steps for rolling back their policy of confrontation with the north, though belatedly, they urged.

articles.title: Myanmar Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Myanmar Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- U Than Tun, vice-president of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited, issued a statement on April 6 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement noted that making long journeys for Songun leadership Kim Jong Il has developed the Korean People's Army into an army strong in idea and faith and energetically led all members of the society to live and work with the idea and work style of the revolutionary army. As a result, the great unity of the army and people of the DPRK has grown as strong as a rock, it noted, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's endless field inspection to KPA units served as a main source that helped bolster up the self-reliant defence capability in every way.
					
					 It noted that the unprecedented miracles and world-startling successes achieved in the building of a thriving nation are a brilliant fruition of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK will be more prosperous as it is holding Kim Jong Il in the van of the revolution, it concluded.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Observed
 Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Korean book and photo exhibitions were opened in Russia, Nigeria, Ethiopia and at the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement from April 1 to 7 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were books and photos introducing the revolutionary careers, exploits and noble personalities of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the Korean people's struggle for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions.
					
					 The curator of the Russian Central Armed Forces Museum referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung gave origin to the Russia-DPRK friendship. The Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army strong enough to reliably defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country with arms under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added.
					
					This exhibition will give Russians an opportunity to deepen their understanding of the army and people of the friendly DPRK and contribute to educating the younger generation in the idea of defending their country and patriotism.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that Kim Jong Il, chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, creditably carrying forward the noble cause of Kim Il Sung, has pursued the unique Songun politics, turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke. He expressed conviction that the Korean people would surely convert their country into a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia, referring to the visit to the DPRK, said that Kim Il Sung was a great man who founded the Juche idea and fully embodied it in the revolution and construction.
